required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Lagenbone on Bone Mineral Density
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Lagenbone on Improvements in Bone Mineral Density - A Pilot Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Southern California University of Health Sciences

clinical_study.source: Southern California University of Health Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: To study the effects of the herbal supplement Lagenbone on Bone Mineral Density

detailed_description.textblock: To study the effects of the herbal supplement Lagenbone on Bone Mineral Density. Lagenbone is a supplement based on the Chinese Herbal formula Gui Lu Er Xian Jiao.

primary_outcome.description: Dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry (DXA) or bone densitometry or Bone Density Scan

secondary_outcome.measure: Short Osteoporosis Quality of Life Questionnaire (ECOS16)
secondary_outcome.description: Short Osteoporosis Quality of Life Questionnaire

arm_group.description: Lagenbone 500mg capsules, 8 capsules by mouth every day for 12 months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Confirmed diagnosis of osteoporosis
- Able to read and understand English
- Willing to receive routine DEXA scans and comply with supplement schedule
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant, lactating, or having gestational diabetes
- Diagnosed with comorbid conditions that they are taking medication for e.g. Acid reflux, Hashimoto's/Grave's Disease, Endometriosis, prostate, breast, uterine cancer, kidney disease, fibroids, psychological disorders
- Use of any medication known to interfere with bone mineral density
- Are taking any new medications/supplements/treatments/therapeutic exercise within the last two months for osteoporosis or bone density
- Involved in health-related litigation, claims
- Missing baseline visits
- Vegan or vegetarian
- Diagnosed with Alzheimer's or demonstrating onset of dementia

overall_official.affiliation: Southern California University of Health Sciences

facility.name: Southern California University of Health Sciences

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Southern California University of Health Sciences
